meta.videoTitle: How to Prevent & Treat Colds & Flu

title_en: Tools: Enhance Gut Microbiome: Foods & Water Protocol
title_zh: 工具：增强肠道微生物组：食物和水方案

paragraphList.text_en: One of the key components of maintaining a healthy immune system is supporting the gut microbiome. The gut microbiome plays a crucial role in keeping our innate immune system functioning at its best. Contrary to popular belief, the gut microbiome encompasses the entire digestive tract, from the mouth to the other end, and different types of microbiota exist at various locations along this tract. To support the gut microbiome effectively, it is recommended to consume two to four servings of low sugar fermented foods daily.
paragraphList.text_zh: 保持健康的免疫系统的关键要素之一是支持肠道菌群。肠道菌群在保持我们的先天免疫系统最佳状态方面发挥着至关重要的作用。与普遍观念相悖，肠道菌群涵盖整个消化道，从口腔到另一端，这一道路上不同类型的微生物在各个位置存在。为了有效支持肠道菌群，建议每日食用两到四份低糖发酵食品。

paragraphList.text_en: Foods such as sauerkraut, kimchi, kefir, and kombucha are examples of low sugar fermented foods that can promote the diversity of microbiota throughout the gut microbiome. These foods contain live cultures that are beneficial for gut health. It is essential to opt for low sugar varieties to avoid potential negative effects of high sugar consumption. Consuming these fermented foods on a regular basis can contribute to the overall health of the gut microbiome, thereby supporting the immune system in its defense against illnesses like colds and flu.
paragraphList.text_zh: 食物如酸菜、泡菜、开菲尔和康普茶等是低糖发酵食物的例子，可以促进整个肠道菌群的多样性。这些食物含有有益于肠道健康的活性菌。选择低糖品种是至关重要的，以避免高糖摄入可能带来的负面影响。定期食用这些发酵食品可以促进肠道菌群的整体健康，从而支持免疫系统抵抗感冒和流感等疾病。

paragraphList.text_en: Additionally, incorporating a Prebiotic or probiotic supplement in capsule form, such as those found in products like Athletic Greens, can further enhance gut health. However, the consumption of low sugar fermented foods remains one of the most effective methods to promote a healthy gut microbiome. While it may require some effort to identify preferred options and incorporate them into your daily diet, the benefits to your overall health, particularly the immune system, make this practice worthwhile.
paragraphList.text_zh: 此外，将益生元或益生菌补充剂以胶囊形式添加进去，比如在Athletic Greens等产品中找到的那些，可以进一步增强肠道健康。然而，低糖发酵食品的摄入仍然是促进健康的肠道微生物群的最有效方法之一。虽然可能需要一些努力来确定首选选项，并将它们纳入您的日常饮食中，但对整体健康，特别是免疫系统的益处，使这种实践是值得的。

paragraphList.text_en: In addition to dietary strategies, a simple and cost-free protocol can also be implemented to support the gut microbiome. Swishing a small amount of clean, clear water in your mouth upon waking and swallowing it before brushing your teeth can potentially benefit the oral and gut microbiomes. This practice, while unconventional to some, is based on the logic of how these microbiomes interact. During sleep, especially for nasal breathers, the mouth can become a breeding ground for bacteria, potentially influencing the gut microbiome. Embracing this protocol is straightforward and may offer benefits in improving gut health, albeit without the support of randomized control trials to confirm its efficacy.
paragraphList.text_zh: 除了膳食策略外，还可以实施一种简单且免费的方案来支持肠道微生物组。在醒来时用少量清洁的凉水漱口并在刷牙之前吞下，可能有益于口腔和肠道微生物组。这种做法虽然对一些人来说很不寻常，但是基于这些微生物组相互作用的逻辑。在睡眠期间，尤其是对于鼻呼吸者来说，口腔可能成为细菌滋生的场所，潜在地影响肠道微生物组。接受这种方案是简单明了的，虽然没有随机对照试验的支持来证实其有效性，但可能在改善肠道健康方面带来好处。

paragraphList.text_en: In conclusion, maintaining a healthy gut microbiome through the consumption of low sugar fermented foods and adopting simple protocols like the one involving water swishing can significantly contribute to enhancing immune function. By prioritizing the health of the gut microbiome, individuals can better equip their bodies to combat infections and support overall well-being.
paragraphList.text_zh: 总的来说，通过食用低糖发酵食品并采用简单的协议，比如漱口可以显著提高免疫功能，从而保持健康的肠道菌群。通过优先考虑肠道菌群的健康，个人可以更好地装备自己的身体抵抗感染并支持整体健康。
